entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a teacher who sweeps the dead spider off the desk onto the floor.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the students who stifled cries when the spider skidded toward him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who felt his face redden as Moody's eyes looked into his own.

entities.name: spider
entities.description: The spider is an object that was killed by the flash of blinding green light.

entities.name: students
entities.description: Several students stifled cries when the spider skidded toward them.

relationships.description: Moody swept the dead spider off the desk onto the floor.
Harry is sitting right in front of Moody, who has survived the same spell that killed the spider.
